/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with power lines and telephone poles, a common sight in many urban areas. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and street furniture.
